sentences.sContent: LL: Yes, it was a special promotion. I love getting freebies. And a calculator is a good freebie.
sentences.sContent_eng: LL: Yes, it was a special promotion. I love getting freebies. And a calculator is a good freebie.
sentences.sCn: 原来是银行在开展特别的推销活动，给开帐户的人送一个礼物。 计算机是有用的东西。不过，凡是免费的我也都喜欢。

synos.tran: 免费的东西；免费赠品（尤指戏院赠券）

trans.tranOther: something that you are given free, usually by a company
